siteMeta.descriptionIndex: A set of 50 inspirational paper cards to stimulate your creativity.
siteMeta.descriptionHowTo: Description, How-to and further Information about the Inspiration Wild Cards
siteMeta.descriptionBuy: Links to shops where you can buy the Inspiration Wild Cards
siteMeta.descriptionImprint: Contact information as well as legal information etc.

howTo.headline: Inspiration Wild Cards
howTo.subheadline: is a set of 50 inspirational cards out of 5 categories. Every card is a stimulation for your creativity. The categories are: super forces, fiction laws, super heroes, stereotypes and nightmares.
howTo.description: This is an inspirational tool for brainstorming, containing 50 wild cards with food for thought. Give your ideation inspiration and boost your innovation with sparks of craziness. The cards bring unexpected solution spaces in every design workshop and disrupt common thought patterns for any product. You want rad product ideas? Here you have 5x10 wild directions you didn't think of.
howTo.futherInfo_paragraph1_a: There is a connected article about inspiration and a structure for the process:
howTo.futherInfo_paragraph1_b: The 3 Phases of Inspiration (Published at UXPA Magazine)
howTo.futherInfo_paragraph1_c: This describes the basic inspiration principle and phases, where a method like the inspiration wild cards can be part of.
howTo.futherInfo_paragraph2_b: you find a page for the Inspiration Wild Cards, containing regular updates and social stuff.
howTo.futherInfo_paragraph3_a: If you want to know the story of how the cards came to life, there is a
howTo.futherInfo_paragraph3_b: Behance project page containing the making-of.
howTo.futherInfo_paragraph3_c: Same for the website, also their making-of is on a separate
howTo.futherInfo_paragraph3: You can also download a press kit with 40 high-res images
howTo.precondition: Precondition: You or your group need new ideas.
howTo.step1: Define the product, use case or feature you want to ideate on.
howTo.step2: Sort out the cards which are not relevant, because they already apply to your problem.
howTo.step4: Each participant takes 5 minutes to rethink the product based on the card. Write it down.
howTo.step5: Discuss together (and/or dot vote) the ideas for the real product.
howTo.Question1: In which languages are the cards available?
howTo.Answer1: The cards are available in English and German language.
howTo.Question2: Which knowledge level does my team or I need to use the cards?
howTo.Answer2: Almost no prerequisite or know-how is needed to use the cards. It's really simple. The only thing you need is a problem or idea or innovation space. Like 'We want to make a new version of our car clock, how can we do something innovative?' or 'We want to come up with a new fantastic feature in our app, but don't know which...'
howTo.Question3: Where can I get more information on the ideation process overall?
howTo.Answer3: You can read the article mentioned above ('further knowledge') or read one of the numerous good books out there about topics like design thinking, User Experience / UX or innovation management.
howTo.Question4: Can I get more than the 50 cards?
howTo.Answer4: Not yet. Maybe in one possible future there will be updated versions. If you have a request or cards you miss or any other idea, please write to info@inspirationwildcards.com.
howTo.Question5: Will there be a full online version of the card set?
howTo.Answer5: Well, if you provide the money to implement a website user management system, maybe.

index.explanation: click or tap the card to flip it

buy.headline: Buy the card set
buy.subheadline: Contains 50 wild cards (size: 118x182mm, printed on recycling paper) that will inspire your next brainstorming!
buy.LOGOS_EN: the card set at Logos Verlag

testimonials.testimonial_1: Viele Leute denken, sie sind nicht kreativ. Mit den Karten ist es aber kinderleicht, auf Ideen zu kommen.
testimonials.testimonial_2: I have awesome ideas usually, but with the cards they become brilliant  - a stroke of genius!
testimonials.testimonial_3: My favorite card is the one with the cat. Meow.
testimonials.testimonial_4: Ich wollte immer reich und berühmt werden. Ich denke, mit den Karten gelingt mir das, die bringen mich viel zum Nachdenken. Mega, das Quartett!
testimonials.testimonial_5: I enjoy trying new things, so I used them in a workshop. A wyld exercise with insane results. It's the ++ for every </>
testimonials.testimonial_6: We started using the wildcards in innovation workshops and what can I say, it works incredibly well. Each and every team improved at least one important feature of their product with the help of the cards. What more can you expect.
testimonials.testimonial_7: I used the card set in several projects in different countries - it's a must-have in my workshop box.
testimonials.testimonial_8: Grazie a una forma maneggevole illustrazioni ben fatte sarà possibile immaginare il proprio prodotto in scenari specifici che non ti saresti mai immaginato. Avreste mai pensato di utilizzare il vostro prodotto nello spazio?
testimonials.testimonial_9: ¡Excelente herramienta para realizar brainstorming en grupo y descubrir ideas que nunca te hubieras imaginado!!
testimonials.testimonial_10: I use the box in innovation workshops. The results are surprising and unexpected. The wild cards are hitting the inspiration nail's head!!!!!!1!11!!!elf!!!!!!
testimonials.testimonial_11: J‘admire l‘attention aux détails apporté à ces wild cards. Chaques illustrations m'entraînent moi et mes clients, plus loin dans l'univers qu‘elles imaginent. Tout simplement inspirant.
testimonials.testimonial_12: Die Karten sind hochwertig verpackt und haben eine super Größe für Gruppen-Workshops. Ich freue mich darauf, das Set mit meinem Team zu testen.
testimonials.testimonial_13: Äußerst wertvoll, wenn ich im Kreativprozess in eine Sackgasse gerate. Ob Marketing, Design, Produktentwicklung - ein Tool, auf das ich nicht wieder verzichten möchte.
testimonials.testimonial_14: Es hilft den Teilnehmern einfach und schnell […] eine große Anzahl an verrückt Ideen zu generieren, die wiederum neue Gedanken und Ideenansetzte ermöglichen.
testimonials.testimonial_15: Sehr cooles Werkzeug, wenn man neue Ideen finden möchte und ausgetretene Pfaden verlassen will. Man kann die Karten aber auch einfach mal zur Hand nehmen, drüberlesen und lächeln.
testimonials.testimonial_16: Check out those awesome 'Inspiration Wild Cards' for your next creativity workshop!
testimonials.testimonial_19: Be prepared for your next creative workshop!
testimonials.testimonial_21: Mega nice!! Ich freue mich riesig sie asap auszuprobieren!
testimonials.testimonial_22: Einfach genial! Die Karten sind fester Bestandteil unseres New Work Coaching Haushalts.
testimonials.testimonial_job_22: UX/CX Expert & Head of Design, Germany
